metadata.dc:title: Prosopagnosia: a case of viral meningoencephalitis
metadata.dc:creator: Ballesteros García, Mario
Criado Álvarez, Juan José
Fernández Cano, Patricia
Fuentes Vázquez, Lourdes
Sánchez Tiemblo, Miriam
metadata.dc:description: Prosopagnosia is a disorder characterised by the inability to recognise known faces. Its presentation alone with no other neuropsychiatric disorder, especially in viral meningoencephalitis, is uncommon(AU)
metadata.dc:source: Rev. clín. med. fam;2(8): 442-444, oct.2009. ilus
metadata.dc:title: Prosopagnosia: un caso de meningoencefalitis viral
